description.value: At 20th level, the full power of a phoenix erupts from within you if you perish. When you die, you are brought back to life, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mxqi375ya2rka7cp]{True Resurrection}, after 1 minute. This ability can be used only once every 24 hours, and if you are slain again within this period, your death is permanent.
